name: Alexander J. Buckles
about:
Autism Advocate: We're enabling individuals on the autism spectrum to live their best-possible lives.

- Father of three awesome children, with more to come (God willing).
- United States Marine 
- 5X founder
- 3X Top-Performing Enterprise Sales Rep
- 1X Sales VP with successful exit
- Field Co-Selling Expert
- 1 major startup failure (countless minor ones) -- if you're not failing, you're not trying hard enough 💪
- Deeply passionate about sales process -- I take it very seriously -- If I challenge you on yours, don't be offended. I'm either trying to make you better or learn from you, so please always view my commentary through that lens.

Dec 2023 - Sep 2024 · 10 mos
Dec 2023 to Sep 2024 · 10 mos
Hired an interim CEO (6x SaaS CRO, up market and down) to help raise capital, shape our GTM, and to be the voice of the customer for us as a seasoned CRO. 

During this period, we raised capital, secured customer case studies, activated an ecosystem of certified advisors on our methodology and as delivery partners, plus led the project for the re-platforming of our core internal technology to support our pivot into a fully-managed services offering, before taking the reins again as CEO.

Founded Forecastable to first solve for internal co-selling, providing B2B mid-market and enterprise deal teams the ability to effectively collaborate on account-development and open sales cycles via our online workspaces, while enforcing sales best practices.

When partnerships started taking the market by storm, we pivoted our technology in that direction and subsequently pivoted to a technology-enablement managed service.

Network, contribute, learn, and drive revenue with other partners operating in the same ecosystems.
Network, contribute, learn, and drive revenue with other partners operating in the same ecosystems.

When you make your ecosystem story and alignment unmistakably deep, your:

- Complete solution makes competitors look dangerously incomplete
- Premium pricing becomes unquestionable
- Revenue teams embrace partners as strategic assets instead of inconvenient add-ons
- Market position strengthens with each intentional partner story “activated”
- Board conversations shift from defensive tactics to offensive strategy

- Six-month engagement as interim CRO
- Purpose of role was to advance autism in the enterprise workforce
- Created leadership's quarterly/annual-planning framework and execution process
- Made material changes to pricing, packaging, and positioning to support enterprise focus
- Implemented contracting strategy that expedited procurement, shortened cycles, and increased TCV
- Built core internal functions serving entire customer lifecycle (sales, customer success, partners, etc.)
- Established partner-led growth mechanism (Goal: 100% Partner Attach)
- Championed creation of enterprise marketplace
- Designed and executed 40-person executive event, driving in-person engagement across industry leaders
- Hired first sales rep, winning two F500 customers in first 60 days, navigating complex procurement
- Crafted variable compensation plan for sales organization
- Interfaced with various investors on an as-needed basis
- Supported founders through daily "founder-level things" (technical term - if you've been in an early-stage startup, you know what I mean)
